title: core_pfam.json
description: JSON schema for core Pfam collection in RCSB Data Warehouse.

accession.description: The unique accession code of protein families and domains in the Pfam database.

identifier.description: The unique identifier of protein families and domains in the Pfam database.

seed_source.description:
Pfam entries are classified into six different categories, depending on the length
 and nature of the sequence regions included in the entry: family, domain, repeats, motifs, coiled-coil, and disordered.

examples: Cell division control protein 24, OB domain 2
description.description: A human-readable name of protein families and domains.

clan_id.description: Details of the Pfam clan to which the entity belongs.

rcsb_pfam_provenance_code.description: Pfam-A is the manually curated portion of the Pfam database.
